paper_abstract: The linear complexity of binary sequences plays a fundamental part in cryptography. In the paper, we construct more general forms of generalized cyclotomic binary sequences with period 2p(m+1)q(n+1). Furthermore, we establish the formula of the linear complexity of proposed sequences. The results reveal that such sequences with period 2p(m+1)q(n+1) have a good balance property and high linear complexity.
paper_title: Linear Complexity of Generalized Cyclotomic Binary Sequences with Period 2p(m+1)q(n+1)
